blog.name: ao3feednamjin
blog.title: *winkwonk*
blog.description: This blog is an AUTOMATED blog that uses an IFTTT algorithm to instantly post fics posted under the relationship: Kim Namjoon | RM/Kim Seokjin | Jin tag on ao3. The owner of this blog (hoseokie-jung) only logs in to delete things that don't belong (rp requests, other ships, etc) once every couple of months because she has a terrible memory and forgets that this is, in fact, her blog.

title: The Lost Prince
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2wFlA3T

by Arissoftie

When the son of the last king and queen of the kingdom Tacenda is found by two con men, Yoongi and Namjoon, his life changes drastically. The two are out for the reward Jimin’s grandma offered to whoever could bring her her precious grandson, but there are dark forces at play, working just as hard to make sure Jimin will never reach Paris alive.

AKA The Yoonmin Anastasia AU no one needed but that I wrote anyway.

Words: 3709, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 방탄소년단 | Bangtan Boys | BTS
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Park Jimin (BTS), Min Yoongi | Suga, Kim Namjoon | RM, Holly (BTS), Kim Seokjin | Jin
  • Relationships: Min Yoongi | Suga/Park Jimin, Kim Namjoon | RM/Kim Seokjin | Jin
  • Additional Tags: yoonmin, Inspired by Anastasia (1997), Anastasia AU, Alternate Universe - Anastasia, Prince Park Jimin, Conman Yoongi, Conman Namjoon, Cute Park Jimin, Park Jimin Is a Little Shit, Min Yoongi | Suga Is Bad at Feelings, Min Yoongi | Suga Is Whipped, Min Yoongi | Suga Is a Little Shit, Kim Namjoon | RM & Min Yoongi | Suga Are Best Friends, Kim Namjoon | RM Is So Done, Established Kim Namjoon | RM/Kim Seokjin | Jin, Fluff and Humor, Light Angst, Orphan Park Jimin, Holly is an important part of the story okay, Angst and Hurt/Comfort, POV Alternating, POV Min Yoongi | Suga, POV Park Jimin, Other Additional Tags to Be Added

summary: bts reaction - their s/o becoming quiet because they think being talkative annoys everyone
title: bts reaction - their s/o becoming quiet because they think being talkative annoys everyone
body:
• requested
  • genre: slight angst, fluff
  • please do not copy my work. but please like and reblog it. thank you!!!!
  • masterlist

kim seokjin

you and seokjin were with the other members. he had wanted to visit them at the dorm since they were on a break, he wanted to hang out with them. of course he was going to being you with him. you sat next to seokjin on the couch. you had just told them a story about something that seokjin did recently. but as you kept talking, it seemed as if everyone was growing antsy and bored during your story. so you quickly ended the story but that left everyone confused. they all glanced at seokjin as if asking what was wrong but seokjin shrugged. the members waved it off and continued to talk but you remained silent, hardly laughing at their stories or jokes, hardly reaction at all. seokjin was worried that something had happened. he gently grabbed your hand, stroking it a bit, and leaned closer to you in order to drown out the others. “hey, what’s wrong?”

you shrugged, “nothing. just listening.”

he shook his head. “what happened with your story earlier? the boys were enjoying it.”

“they weren’t. they looked like they weren’t even listening. i talk too much seokjin.”

seokjin sighed. “y/n, it was all in your head. they all were enjoying your story about me tripping on the rug, falling onto the bed only to roll onto the floor. they were waiting for the end.”

you looked at him. “really? they weren’t annoyed that i was talking too much.”

seokjin shook his head, smiling at you. “you don’t talk too much and you don’t annoy anyone. now, continue your embarrassing story about me.”

min yoongi

the boys had just finished a long day of practice. you had been with them for moral support. honestly you wanted to go home after since you were tired from a long day of helping the staff and supporting the boys, but namjoon wanted to treat everyone to a nice late dinner for all the hard work. you were fine now because who could ever refuse food and you loved to hang out with the boys? but something felt off to you. the boys were all joking and calling each other out on things or talking about cats, and this caused you too feel more like an eighth wheel. so you decided that you should just be quiet for once, instead of arguing or talking with the others. yoongi immediately noticed your silence. normally you would argue with seokjin about food but this time you agreed with him. plus, you haven’t said a word when normally you would’ve recited an entire speech by now. “why aren’t you talking?” he asked while eating.

you shrugged. “i’m just tired.”

“i know you better than that, babe.” he put don his food to look at you. “what’s wrong?”

you glanced at the other boys before turning back to yoongi. “i just feel like i’m annoying. i’m an eighth wheel.”

yoongi laughed at you. “you’re not an eighth wheel. we’re all friends here.”

you shook your head. “just admit it, i’m annoying as hell.”

“maybe, but then that would mean we all are annoying as hell. we all talk a lot too, y/n, you’re no different. you shouldn’t feel like you annoy everyone just because you’re talkative.”

you nodded, smiling at yoongi. “thanks, yoong.”

jung hoseok

you had come to see hoseok and the boys while they were at the dorms. you had brought them some food you made them. they all thanked you and tried to spark a conversation with you but you seemed off. they felt awkward because they didn’t know what else to do. hoseok, as your boyfriend, noticed your mood. you would smile at them and he could tell that you were about to say or wanted to say something, but held yourself back. he looked at you, an idea popping into your head. “y/n, tell them about the pun you came up with this morning.”

your eyes lit up but then you shook your head, a small smile on your face. “you tell them, hoseok. it would be much better for you too.” that hurt hoseok, you were very proud of your joke and was telling him that you would come by to tell seokjin and the others. but now you didn’t want to. “well, it’s not funny if you don’t tell it.”

“tell me, y/n.” seokjin said with anticipation. 

you shook your head and then suddenly stood up. “i just remembered. i think i left my stove on.”

hoseok jumped up. “i’m going home with you.”

now you and hoseok were walking. you didn’t say much then. hoseok grabbed your hand. “why is my little ray of sunshine so down?” he asked in an attempt to get you to smile.

“i just feel like i’ve been annoying everyone recently. i talk too much.”

hoseok’s eyes widened. “if anything i talk too much. y/n, if this is about the others, the boys love you. they don’t think you talk too much. and you’re not at all annoying.”

you sighed, “i guess i have just been overthinking everything then.”

“obviously. now, let’s turn off this stove of yours.” wink, wink.

kim namjoon

recently, you had a friend that wasn’t actually your friend. she was your coworker and somehow found out that you were dating kim namjoon. you haven’t told anybody or the fans yet because namjoon wanted to wait. you were suspicious when this girl was suddenly all over you but you thought she was just being friendly. then one day, she questioned if you were dating, if you had met anyone famous. not wanting to reveal anything, you said you were single and would never have a chance to meet a celebrity. but then she called you a liar and became super heated about you. she called you annoying, saying you talked too much, revealing that she knew of your relationship. that drastically changed your mood. so here you were sitting next to namjoon and the boys, only you were staring off into space and not paying attention.

“love?” namjoon whispered. you looked at him. “what happened?” you asked.

“taehyung asked you a question.” he said.

“oh sorry, taehyung.”

he smiled. “it’s fine. i was just asking if you wanted to say something. you’ve been quiet.”

“i’d rather not.”

namjoon looked at you as if he had seen a ghost. “jagi, you love talking.”

you sighed. “recently a girl i used to be friends with, she knew we were dating and had become friends with me. she wanted to meet you guys but of course i wasn’t going to let her. so she called me annoying and said i spoke too much.”

everyone looked at you in surprise. namjoon spoke. “you are not annoying, y/n.”

“yeah, we love when you talk. you’re funny and tell amazing stories.” all the other members chimed in. they definitely cheered you up.

park jimin

you and the boys were on a road trip. namjoon suggested it when he saw an ad for a new vacation spot. he thought why not since they were on vacation. you sat in the very back with jimin on your right and yoongi on his right. you had talked a lot for the first hour but after it there was silence. it was because everyone wanted to nap or listen to music but you wanted to overthink and came to the conclusion that it was because everyone was annoyed by you. you had been excited about this trip and now you felt that you were a tag along. you decided to remain quiet and not talk. two hours into the trip, everyone started to get full of energy from the ride and began to talk. eventually, seokjin (who was driving) had to check in the rear-view mirror, “if y/n still alive?” he joked.

jimin and the other laughed. jimin replied. “they are, they’re just being super quiet.” he then looked at you with concern in his eyes. 

you smiled but looked away. “why aren’t you saying anything?” he asked.

“i’ve annoyed everyone enough for today.”

he stared at you and then the members. “when have you ever annoyed us?”

seokjin spoke up, “just a minute ago i thought you were dead you were so quiet.”

“i don’t like when y/n’s quiet.” jungkook commented.

your eyes widened. you looked at jimin. he smiled at you and wrapped an arm around your shoulder. “please talk, jagi.”

kim taehyung

you were sitting on the couch minding your own business. the boys were around you doing their own thing. yoongi was on his laptop, jungkook and taehyung were playing games, seokjin was in the kitchen cooking lunch, etc. you sat next to taehyung as he payed attention to his game. but suddenly, he jumped up. “i’m finally better than jungkook!!!!” he announced proudly.

you smiled at him before he pulled you off the couch, wanting you to dance with him. you did and then he turned your around the face the members. “tell how amazing i am, jagi.”

you looked at the members, smiling at you and taehyung. but you suddenly felt shy and nervous. “taehyung is amazing.” you said quietly.

taehyung looked at you and turned around. “are you okay?”

“yes. why?”

“normally you’d tell me that you were rooting for jungkook or give a speech about how much better i am compared to the others.”

you shrugged. “i don’t feel like annoying everyone with my voice today.”

“what do you mean?”

“every time i start to talk, i annoy everyone.”

“you don’t annoy anyone. please stop thinking that.”

jeon jungkook

you and the boy were at an amusement park. you had been dying to go since summer was coming to an end and the colder weather was around the corner. but you decided that you weren’t going to annoy anyone on this trip. you wanted everyone to have fun, even if you weren’t going to be able to because you wouldn’t let yourself talk too much. upon entering the park. the boys became excited and loud. you wanted to join them but you stayed behind the group, keeping out of their way. you got so concentrated on staying silent (because you wanted to talk so bad) that you didn’t even notice that the boys were trying to talk to you. you looked at them and smiled. jungkook turned to you. “what ride do you want to go on?” 

you shrugged. “you guys choose.”

jungkook stared at you, noticing something was off. “you guys go ahead. we can meet up later.”

the boys nodded and left. then jungkook looked at you. “is something wrong? i thought you were excited to come here.”

“i was…am. but…”

“but what?”

“i don’t want to annoy anyone.”

jungkook looked at you, confusion written on his face. 

“i talk a lot.” you told him.

“oh,” jungkook said, everything coming together in his mind. “jagi, everyone thought something was wrong because you were being too quiet.”

“really?”

“yeah, they want you to talk, it’s something they like about you.”

you smiled. “i guess i was just being stupid.”

“yeah you were.” he said while smiling sweetly at you.
body_abstract:
• requested
  • genre: slight angst, fluff
  • please do not copy my work. but please like and reblog it. thank you!!!!
  • masterlist

kim seokjin

you and seokjin were with the other members. he had wanted to visit them at the dorm since they were on a break, he wanted to hang out with them. of course he was going to being you with him. you sat next to seokjin on the couch. you had just told them a story about something that seokjin did recently. but as you kept talking, it seemed as if everyone was growing antsy and bored during your story. so you quickly ended the story but that left everyone confused. they all glanced at seokjin as if asking what was wrong but seokjin shrugged. the members waved it off and continued to talk but you remained silent, hardly laughing at their stories or jokes, hardly reaction at all. seokjin was worried that something had happened. he gently grabbed your hand, stroking it a bit, and leaned closer to you in order to drown out the others. “hey, what’s wrong?”

you shrugged, “nothing. just listening.”

he shook his head. “what happened with your story earlier? the boys were enjoying it.”

“they weren’t. they looked like they weren’t even listening. i talk too much seokjin.”

seokjin sighed. “y/n, it was all in your head. they all were enjoying your story about me tripping on the rug, falling onto the bed only to roll onto the floor. they were waiting for the end.”

you looked at him. “really? they weren’t annoyed that i was talking too much.”

seokjin shook his head, smiling at you. “you don’t talk too much and you don’t annoy anyone. now, continue your embarrassing story about me.”

kim seokjin

you and seokjin were with the other members. he had wanted to visit them at the dorm since they were on a break, he wanted to hang out with them. of course he was going to being you with him. you sat next to seokjin on the couch. you had just told them a story about something that seokjin did recently. but as you kept talking, it seemed as if everyone was growing antsy and bored during your story. so you quickly ended the story but that left everyone confused. they all glanced at seokjin as if asking what was wrong but seokjin shrugged. the members waved it off and continued to talk but you remained silent, hardly laughing at their stories or jokes, hardly reaction at all. seokjin was worried that something had happened. he gently grabbed your hand, stroking it a bit, and leaned closer to you in order to drown out the others. “hey, what’s wrong?”

you shrugged, “nothing. just listening.”

he shook his head. “what happened with your story earlier? the boys were enjoying it.”

“they weren’t. they looked like they weren’t even listening. i talk too much seokjin.”

seokjin sighed. “y/n, it was all in your head. they all were enjoying your story about me tripping on the rug, falling onto the bed only to roll onto the floor. they were waiting for the end.”

you looked at him. “really? they weren’t annoyed that i was talking too much.”

seokjin shook his head, smiling at you. “you don’t talk too much and you don’t annoy anyone. now, continue your embarrassing story about me.”

[[MORE]]

min yoongi

the boys had just finished a long day of practice. you had been with them for moral support. honestly you wanted to go home after since you were tired from a long day of helping the staff and supporting the boys, but namjoon wanted to treat everyone to a nice late dinner for all the hard work. you were fine now because who could ever refuse food and you loved to hang out with the boys? but something felt off to you. the boys were all joking and calling each other out on things or talking about cats, and this caused you too feel more like an eighth wheel. so you decided that you should just be quiet for once, instead of arguing or talking with the others. yoongi immediately noticed your silence. normally you would argue with seokjin about food but this time you agreed with him. plus, you haven’t said a word when normally you would’ve recited an entire speech by now. “why aren’t you talking?” he asked while eating.

you shrugged. “i’m just tired.”

“i know you better than that, babe.” he put don his food to look at you. “what’s wrong?”

you glanced at the other boys before turning back to yoongi. “i just feel like i’m annoying. i’m an eighth wheel.”

yoongi laughed at you. “you’re not an eighth wheel. we’re all friends here.”

you shook your head. “just admit it, i’m annoying as hell.”

“maybe, but then that would mean we all are annoying as hell. we all talk a lot too, y/n, you’re no different. you shouldn’t feel like you annoy everyone just because you’re talkative.”

you nodded, smiling at yoongi. “thanks, yoong.”

jung hoseok

you had come to see hoseok and the boys while they were at the dorms. you had brought them some food you made them. they all thanked you and tried to spark a conversation with you but you seemed off. they felt awkward because they didn’t know what else to do. hoseok, as your boyfriend, noticed your mood. you would smile at them and he could tell that you were about to say or wanted to say something, but held yourself back. he looked at you, an idea popping into your head. “y/n, tell them about the pun you came up with this morning.”

your eyes lit up but then you shook your head, a small smile on your face. “you tell them, hoseok. it would be much better for you too.” that hurt hoseok, you were very proud of your joke and was telling him that you would come by to tell seokjin and the others. but now you didn’t want to. “well, it’s not funny if you don’t tell it.”

“tell me, y/n.” seokjin said with anticipation. 

you shook your head and then suddenly stood up. “i just remembered. i think i left my stove on.”

hoseok jumped up. “i’m going home with you.”

now you and hoseok were walking. you didn’t say much then. hoseok grabbed your hand. “why is my little ray of sunshine so down?” he asked in an attempt to get you to smile.

“i just feel like i’ve been annoying everyone recently. i talk too much.”

hoseok’s eyes widened. “if anything i talk too much. y/n, if this is about the others, the boys love you. they don’t think you talk too much. and you’re not at all annoying.”

you sighed, “i guess i have just been overthinking everything then.”

“obviously. now, let’s turn off this stove of yours.” wink, wink.

kim namjoon

recently, you had a friend that wasn’t actually your friend. she was your coworker and somehow found out that you were dating kim namjoon. you haven’t told anybody or the fans yet because namjoon wanted to wait. you were suspicious when this girl was suddenly all over you but you thought she was just being friendly. then one day, she questioned if you were dating, if you had met anyone famous. not wanting to reveal anything, you said you were single and would never have a chance to meet a celebrity. but then she called you a liar and became super heated about you. she called you annoying, saying you talked too much, revealing that she knew of your relationship. that drastically changed your mood. so here you were sitting next to namjoon and the boys, only you were staring off into space and not paying attention.

“love?” namjoon whispered. you looked at him. “what happened?” you asked.

“taehyung asked you a question.” he said.

“oh sorry, taehyung.”

he smiled. “it’s fine. i was just asking if you wanted to say something. you’ve been quiet.”

“i’d rather not.”

namjoon looked at you as if he had seen a ghost. “jagi, you love talking.”

you sighed. “recently a girl i used to be friends with, she knew we were dating and had become friends with me. she wanted to meet you guys but of course i wasn’t going to let her. so she called me annoying and said i spoke too much.”

everyone looked at you in surprise. namjoon spoke. “you are not annoying, y/n.”

“yeah, we love when you talk. you’re funny and tell amazing stories.” all the other members chimed in. they definitely cheered you up.

park jimin

you and the boys were on a road trip. namjoon suggested it when he saw an ad for a new vacation spot. he thought why not since they were on vacation. you sat in the very back with jimin on your right and yoongi on his right. you had talked a lot for the first hour but after it there was silence. it was because everyone wanted to nap or listen to music but you wanted to overthink and came to the conclusion that it was because everyone was annoyed by you. you had been excited about this trip and now you felt that you were a tag along. you decided to remain quiet and not talk. two hours into the trip, everyone started to get full of energy from the ride and began to talk. eventually, seokjin (who was driving) had to check in the rear-view mirror, “if y/n still alive?” he joked.

jimin and the other laughed. jimin replied. “they are, they’re just being super quiet.” he then looked at you with concern in his eyes. 

you smiled but looked away. “why aren’t you saying anything?” he asked.

“i’ve annoyed everyone enough for today.”

he stared at you and then the members. “when have you ever annoyed us?”

seokjin spoke up, “just a minute ago i thought you were dead you were so quiet.”

“i don’t like when y/n’s quiet.” jungkook commented.

your eyes widened. you looked at jimin. he smiled at you and wrapped an arm around your shoulder. “please talk, jagi.”

kim taehyung

you were sitting on the couch minding your own business. the boys were around you doing their own thing. yoongi was on his laptop, jungkook and taehyung were playing games, seokjin was in the kitchen cooking lunch, etc. you sat next to taehyung as he payed attention to his game. but suddenly, he jumped up. “i’m finally better than jungkook!!!!” he announced proudly.

you smiled at him before he pulled you off the couch, wanting you to dance with him. you did and then he turned your around the face the members. “tell how amazing i am, jagi.”

you looked at the members, smiling at you and taehyung. but you suddenly felt shy and nervous. “taehyung is amazing.” you said quietly.

taehyung looked at you and turned around. “are you okay?”

“yes. why?”

“normally you’d tell me that you were rooting for jungkook or give a speech about how much better i am compared to the others.”

you shrugged. “i don’t feel like annoying everyone with my voice today.”

“what do you mean?”

“every time i start to talk, i annoy everyone.”

“you don’t annoy anyone. please stop thinking that.”

jeon jungkook

you and the boy were at an amusement park. you had been dying to go since summer was coming to an end and the colder weather was around the corner. but you decided that you weren’t going to annoy anyone on this trip. you wanted everyone to have fun, even if you weren’t going to be able to because you wouldn’t let yourself talk too much. upon entering the park. the boys became excited and loud. you wanted to join them but you stayed behind the group, keeping out of their way. you got so concentrated on staying silent (because you wanted to talk so bad) that you didn’t even notice that the boys were trying to talk to you. you looked at them and smiled. jungkook turned to you. “what ride do you want to go on?” 

you shrugged. “you guys choose.”

jungkook stared at you, noticing something was off. “you guys go ahead. we can meet up later.”

the boys nodded and left. then jungkook looked at you. “is something wrong? i thought you were excited to come here.”

“i was…am. but…”

“but what?”

“i don’t want to annoy anyone.”

jungkook looked at you, confusion written on his face. 

“i talk a lot.” you told him.

“oh,” jungkook said, everything coming together in his mind. “jagi, everyone thought something was wrong because you were being too quiet.”

“really?”

“yeah, they want you to talk, it’s something they like about you.”

you smiled. “i guess i was just being stupid.”

“yeah you were.” he said while smiling sweetly at you.

you were sitting on the couch minding your own business. the boys were around you doing their own thing. yoongi was on his laptop, jungkook and taehyung were playing games, seokjin was in the kitchen cooking lunch, etc. you sat next to taehyung as he payed attention to his game. but suddenly, he jumped up. “i’m finally better than jungkook!!!!” he announced proudly.

you smiled at him before he pulled you off the couch, wanting you to dance with him. you did and then he turned your around the face the members. “tell how amazing i am, jagi.”

you looked at the members, smiling at you and taehyung. but you suddenly felt shy and nervous. “taehyung is amazing.” you said quietly.

taehyung looked at you and turned around. “are you okay?”

“yes. why?”

“normally you’d tell me that you were rooting for jungkook or give a speech about how much better i am compared to the others.”

you shrugged. “i don’t feel like annoying everyone with my voice today.”

“what do you mean?”

“every time i start to talk, i annoy everyone.”

“you don’t annoy anyone. please stop thinking that.”

jeon jungkook

you and the boy were at an amusement park. you had been dying to go since summer was coming to an end and the colder weather was around the corner. but you decided that you weren’t going to annoy anyone on this trip. you wanted everyone to have fun, even if you weren’t going to be able to because you wouldn’t let yourself talk too much. upon entering the park. the boys became excited and loud. you wanted to join them but you stayed behind the group, keeping out of their way. you got so concentrated on staying silent (because you wanted to talk so bad) that you didn’t even notice that the boys were trying to talk to you. you looked at them and smiled. jungkook turned to you. “what ride do you want to go on?” 

you shrugged. “you guys choose.”

jungkook stared at you, noticing something was off. “you guys go ahead. we can meet up later.”

the boys nodded and left. then jungkook looked at you. “is something wrong? i thought you were excited to come here.”

“i was…am. but…”

“but what?”

“i don’t want to annoy anyone.”

jungkook looked at you, confusion written on his face. 

“i talk a lot.” you told him.

“oh,” jungkook said, everything coming together in his mind. “jagi, everyone thought something was wrong because you were being too quiet.”

“really?”

“yeah, they want you to talk, it’s something they like about you.”

you smiled. “i guess i was just being stupid.”

“yeah you were.” he said while smiling sweetly at you.
trail.content_abstract:
• requested
  • genre: slight angst, fluff
  • please do not copy my work. but please like and reblog it. thank you!!!!
  • masterlist

kim seokjin

you and seokjin were with the other members. he had wanted to visit them at the dorm since they were on a break, he wanted to hang out with them. of course he was going to being you with him. you sat next to seokjin on the couch. you had just told them a story about something that seokjin did recently. but as you kept talking, it seemed as if everyone was growing antsy and bored during your story. so you quickly ended the story but that left everyone confused. they all glanced at seokjin as if asking what was wrong but seokjin shrugged. the members waved it off and continued to talk but you remained silent, hardly laughing at their stories or jokes, hardly reaction at all. seokjin was worried that something had happened. he gently grabbed your hand, stroking it a bit, and leaned closer to you in order to drown out the others. “hey, what’s wrong?”

you shrugged, “nothing. just listening.”

he shook his head. “what happened with your story earlier? the boys were enjoying it.”

“they weren’t. they looked like they weren’t even listening. i talk too much seokjin.”

seokjin sighed. “y/n, it was all in your head. they all were enjoying your story about me tripping on the rug, falling onto the bed only to roll onto the floor. they were waiting for the end.”

you looked at him. “really? they weren’t annoyed that i was talking too much.”

seokjin shook his head, smiling at you. “you don’t talk too much and you don’t annoy anyone. now, continue your embarrassing story about me.”
